title: Siigari
author: Siigari
content: I am curious. I have two 4090s and am curious to know what my hashrate would be.Thanks!

comments.author: NotFuzzyWarm
comments.body: It all depends on target difficulty of the coin. With BTC diff at 47.89T it would be abysmal.For alt sha256 crapcoins which all have far lower diff, ask in the altcoin areas of the Forum. This area is for BTC only.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: Siigari on April 20, 2023, 12:59:07 AMI am curious. I have two 4090s and am curious to know what my hashrate would be.Thanks!.5gh was the old amd 7900 cards my guess is 8x that which is 4gh this is merely a guess may be low so lets revise to 4gh-8ghan old s9 does 14,000 gha s17 does 50,000 gha s19 does 100,000 ghpoint to cfx octopus algo on nicehash and convert to btc.btw not to be discussed in btc section.it is considered an altcoin subject.
